text: Va [ruzi qijomat] hamagi dar pesgohi Alloh taolo hozir [-u oskor] mesavand, pas, [dar in hangom] sitamdidagon ʙa kasone, ki gardankasi mekardand, megujand: « Mo [dar dunjo] pajravi sumo ʙudem, pas, ojo [imruz] metavoned, cize az azoʙi Allohro az mo ʙozdored»? Onon megujand: «Agar Alloh taolo moro [dar dunjo ʙa suji rastagori] rohnamoi mekard, mo niz rohro ʙa sumo nison medodem. Ci ʙetoʙi kunem jo sikeʙoi namoem, ʙarojamon jakson ast. [Hec] Gurezgohe nadorem»
